newsitem.title: CANADA: Teknor to make initial public offering of shares.
newsitem.headline: Teknor to make initial public offering of shares.

text.p: Teknor Industrial Computers Inc said on Thursday that it filed a preliminary prospectus for an initial public offering of common shares with the securities commission of each Canadian province.
The total offering will amount to about C$40 million, the company said.

Teknor designs and manufactures high-end industrial computer boards and systems for major original equipment makers, the company said. Its sales for the year ending November 30 are forecast at C$33.3 million, with earnings before interest, income taxes, depreciation and amortization at C$5.7 million, it said.
